#source: https://www.ndsu.edu/pubweb/~sainieid/north-dakota-historical-population.html
Population data in North Dakota (oil boom)

Date: Population
1870:	2,405
1880:	36,909
1890:	190,983
1900:	319,146
1910:	577,056
1920:	646,872
1930:	680,845
1940:	641,935
1950:	619,636
1960:	632,446
1970:	617,761
1980:	652,717
1990:	638,800
2000:	641,298
2001:	636,225
2002:	633,210
2003:	631,680
2004:	635,480
2005:	634,528
2006:	636,019
2007:	637,534
2008:	640,525
2009:	645,903
2010:	674,344
2011:	684,867
2012:	701,345
2013:	723,393
